video_prompt: Female character's head tilts right, large eyes gaze. Teal hair pigtails sway. Flowing white jacket shifts. Teal tie subtly moves. Abstract blue-white shapes dissolve and reform in background.
image_prompt: anime girl, teal hair in voluminous pigtails with black and pink accessories, blue-green eyes, pale skin. Wearing a black choker, black flower earrings with pink centers, white scoop-neck dress with green scalloped trim, loose white long-sleeved jacket/hoodie, and a long teal tie. Pink "01 HATSUNE MIKU" tattoo on left arm. Abstract blue-white ethereal background. Waist-up, character looking right, vibrant, sharp lines, smooth shading.
refined_video_prompt: A female character's head gently tilts right, her large eyes subtly shifting focus. Teal hair pigtails sway softly. Her flowing white jacket shifts, and her teal tie subtly moves. In the background, abstract blue-white shapes continuously dissolve and reform.
